descriptions: Manage the SQL database by using PostgreSQL
Implement, deploy and maintain the backend for the website by using Flask in Python
Manage the microservices architecture of the website by using Docker
Develop the load balancer for the website by using Nginx
Create a websocket funtionality for chat module by using Golang
Write bash scripts that monitor the status of the docker containers
Write testing scripts and documentations for the backend APIs
Handle the lab session for the course, Fundamentals of Programming (WIX1002) Session 2020/2021 Semester 1
Design the assignment question and evaluate the submissions from the students
Introduce the students about the basics knowledge of programming by using Java as the programming language for practical sessions
Share the experiences in using JavaFX to develop the graphic user interface (GUI) for assignment of this subject

Being a member of the UM iLab team to collaborate with MIMOS to design, create and enhance the dashboard using Apache Superset that was shown to the Prime Minister to monitor the vaccination progress in Malaysia
Modify the codes of Apache Superset to integrate with Apache Echarts and Highcharts for more variety of visualizations
Develop authentication timeout and prevention of concurrent login on Apache Superset
Develop the log parsers for Nginx, Gunicorn, CheckMK, Linux, PostgreSQL, Redis and Haproxy logs
Design and build the dashboards on Apache Superset for log analysis
Write python scripts to perform data validation

Work as a student under University of Malaya (UM) to help in developing a dashboard for the Panasonic to monitor the overall equipment effectiveness (OEE) of the assembly lines and design an IoT architecture to collect the data from the machines on the assembly lines
Design the Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) pipeline to extract the data from the machines
Design and manage a normalized database for the application
Deploy the server on Amazon Web Service (AWS) by using EC2
Enhance the existing website by adding more features
Refactor the existing codes to adapt with better coding practices
Write testing scripts and documentations for the backend APIs
Maintain the website
Perform User Acceptance Testing on the CADS platforms
Conduct a Data Science Project about the complaints priority prediction
Work as a training assistant to help in conducting the training courses
Write documentations to guide the users of the platforms
Implement automated testing script for the platforms by using Cypress
Understand the C# and VB6 coding and analyze the cause of bugs as well as implement the solutions for it
Fixed more than 80 bugs throughout my internship
Develop a report for analysis of the customer bug reports by using PowerBI
Being a member of the UM iLab team to collaborate with University of Melbourne to develop an open source repository for the UI components built based on US Core Implementation Guideline for FHIR
Plan the timeline for the project and tasks to be assigned to the team members
Perform unit testing by using vitest and document the codes by using JSDoc
